put.summary: Add a user to the target group.

parameters.name: hub
parameters.description: Target hub name, which should start with alphabetic characters and only contain alpha-numeric characters or underscore.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Target group name, which length should be greater than 0 and less than 1025.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Target user Id

parameters.name: application
parameters.description: Target application name, which should start with alphabetic characters and only contain alpha-numeric characters or underscore.

parameters.name: ttl
parameters.description: Specifies the seconds that the user exists in the group. If not set, the user lives in the group for 1 year at most. If a user is added to some groups without ttl limitation, only the latest updated 100 groups will be reserved among all groups the user joined without TTL. If ttl = 0, only the current connected connections of the target user will be added to the target group.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The version of the REST APIs.

AccessKeyResponse.description: The response object containing the dynamic access key for signing client tokens.

AccessKey.description: The string value of the access key for SignalR app server to sign client tokens.

KeyId.description: The ID of the access key.

ClientTokenResponse.description: The response object containing the token for the client

token.description: The token value for the WebSocket client to connect to the service

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

code.description: A more specific error code than was provided by the containing error.

parameters.name: endpoint
parameters.description: HTTP or HTTPS endpoint for the Web PubSub service instance.
